summary: A mummy-like draugr, the body is wrapped in linen sheets.
descriptionHtml:
A mummy-like draugr, the body is wrapped in linen sheets.

  There are 8 new meshes with different combinations: female/male, with underwear/without underwear, with strypes/without strypes.They use vanilla linens textures (with modified UVmaps) so they are not included here: the game should recognize the paths to them automatically.
 There is an extra female model which I did not like the result, but I added it anyway. In case you like it... 

  This is a modders´ resource and they are not in-game yet, I included an .esp file for creature evaluation. If you want to check how they look: extract the content of this mod to your game´s \"data\" folder. Activate MummydraugrTEST and Launch Skyrim. Use the console and type \"coc AAAtestmummy\".

You may use and redistribute this as you wish since you don´t charge 
money for it, just give me the credits.

**********************************************************************
WHAT´S NEW
**********************************************************************

 -Fixed normal maps for 2 meshes

 -Added 5 \"mummy corpse\" meshes to be used as containers.
author: Leodoidao
